Description: Fragment from neck of pottery trefoil oinochoe, thick matt black glaze with painted eye in added white on outside; inside unglazed. Hard-fired dense clay (Munsell 5 YR 6/6) with some sand and lime inclusions, little silver mica.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 75-6. no. Nau 5, pl. 1, fig. e)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.769)
